On Apr 20, 2007, at 5:58 AM, shanemcdonaldryan wrote:

> I think you are l=
ooking at too narrow a range of values (-1 to 1).

Why do you think that?  =
Outside of about [-1.5,1.5], the function is  
effectively -1 and 1.

where=
 f(x) is 1/(1+exp(-4.9x))

f(1) =3D 0.992
f(1.25) =3D 0.998
f(1.5) =3D 0.99=
9
f(2) =3D 0.9999
...
f(8) =3D 1 (or something VERY close to it)

Here's a =
graph of some of my own approximations, found via  
differential evolution.=
.  I just thought you'd like to know that your  
polynomial looks nothing l=
ike this.

--Steve

=EF=BF=BC
